subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Messages for Frank
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi Juli,

yes, the "Frank Sumption" EVP is indeed amazingly clear. Frank must be a
true celebrity over there. Most impressive!

Stefan

-- 

> During a skype session on Friday, myself, Joel and Steve got some
> great files! The strenght of the audio regarding our own Frank
> Sumption was truly amazing. This is the best part of the communication
> and makes me proud to me apart of all of this.
   
>   If its one thing for sure, they certainly love and know Frank!
   
>   Enjoy!
>   Juli
